issue.title: Setting GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH overrides the compile-time default

content.raw: If the `setup.sh` needs to be sourced before modifying the Gazebo environmental variables (as mentioned in the [components tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=components#EnvironmentVariables) ) it would be nice to mention this in the [plugins hello world tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials/?tut=plugins_hello_world) that probably introduced the `GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH` variable to most developers of Gazebo plugins.
